title: Engineering Challenges
subtitle: Design and Build Structures
description: Learn engineering by designing bridges, towers, and vehicles. Calculate materials and test strength!

bridge.title: Bridge Design
bridge.description: Design a strong bridge that can support heavy loads

tower.title: Tower Design
tower.description: Build a tall tower that can stand firmly

vehicle.title: Vehicle Design
vehicle.description: Create a vehicle that can carry heavy cargo

tips.title: Engineering Tips:
tips.tip1: Steel is stronger but more expensive than wood
tips.tip2: More parts = stronger structure but higher cost
